mapper.select: select od.option_key as optionKey, o.property as property, od.property_val as propertyVal, od.code_val as codeVal from dc_option_detail od left join dc_option o on o.option_key=od.option_key where od.option_key=#{optionKey}
select o.option_key as optionKey, o.property as property from dc_option o where o.code_key=#{codeKey}
